website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you have tough cutting to do; otherwise, they might not be practical.
pros: Spring-loaded action and sharp blades provide rugged cutting action
Comes with a worry-free replacement guarantee
cons: Some of our testers with small hands found them difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: One word. Solid.
customer_reviews.text: One word. Solid. Second word. Cuts. I'm a saltwater fisherman and between heavy duty scissors and wire cutters to process fish for the grill I know what I need. Wish I had these shears decades ago. Uggghh. Well, lucky I have them now to make things a breeze in cutting. Buy these. It's pennies for how long they'll last and run you.
customer_reviews.author: REELIN REALIN

customer_reviews.title: Slippery handles when wet
customer_reviews.text: These do cut cardboard easily as in the video reviews, BUT..... Spatchcocking a chicken, not so much. The blades don't have much "grip", and tend to slide off of the chicken when cutting. The handles are smooth, and once you're into the job, are quite slippery as well. The Gelindo handles don't allow for enough leverage to keep the blades in place when clamping down. In the past I've don't the same job with kitchen scissors and now realize that it is the looped handles of the scissors that are most important - the loops allow for leverage even with slippery handles..
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty is right! The biggest pair of kitchen shears I've ever had, so they took a little getting used to, but they make spatchcocking chicken a quick and easy task, which is exactly what I wanted. This well-made pair of shears should last for practically ever. (If you have small or weak hands, these may not be the shears for you.)
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: not very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Not as sharp as I hoped it would be. Everything I tried to use it on ie food and vegetables, I had a hard time cutting with it. kind of a waste of my money.The only thing nice about these kitchen shears are the grips for cutting. I wouldn't purchase these again
customer_reviews.author: Seaellie

customer_reviews.title: Overall its pretty darn good some minor issues over time.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in May 2017 and the main reason is I was tired of buying kitchen shears and after 2-4 months trowing them away for various reasons. Overall these have been great but now the retaining clip "Safety Clip" will not stay latched and it keeps popping open. The other issue is it loosens up a little and now when I use it, it catches a little on the "bone" cutout.
customer_reviews.author: BobT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Value Added!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new kitchen scissors. I use it for everthing from cutting meet to opening up boxes in the kitchen. The blades are very sharp and it gets the job done effortlessly. This is definitely an added Value to my Kitchen. I JUST HAVE TO FIGURE OUT HOW TO KEEP THEM IN THE KITCHEN AWAY FROM EVERYONE ELSE IN THE HOUSE!!!!:(
customer_reviews.author: ATS

customer_reviews.title: Hazardous... But has a use... Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought for ease in kitchen, I am arthritic and thought difficulty was because of my hands, but other family members have difficulty as well to the point of it being hazardous. When you unlock it springs very sharply (pun intended) Received a nice reply and wanted to update? They are fit for what was described, but definitley not for everyone, especially arthritic. Still need a good pair, but NO spring!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to cut chicken bones and surprisingly had a difficult time cutting through the bones. I bought this specifically because of the high ratings and was both surprised and disappointed at it's performance. Unfortunately I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of scissors, must have for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These scissors have a great weight balance to them. I love the locking handle to avoid losing a finger in the utensil drawer!! Easy to use and have a nice cutting edge to them. This will be a future purchase again in the future if I need another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Frese

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Quality. Quality.
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are amazing quality. They are heavy, great for cutting through lobster or crab shells and clean up super easy. I have not attempted to take them apart to clean them so I am not sure about that but I am in love with brand and it's quality. HEAVY DUTY!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Quality scissors
customer_reviews.text: These Kitchen Scissors are great. They are different from my other pair, which I still have and use, in that they spring open and you use force to close them to cut. I use my scissors to cut up my roast chicken and these do a good solid job.
customer_reviews.author: B. Young

customer_reviews.title: Useful for poultry shearing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these kitchen scissors for spatchcocking a turkey. This requires removing the ribs from the backbone of the turkey. I was able to remove all these ribs on a large (22 lb) turkey. With some of the bigger ribs, it required quite a bit of force and the scissors became somewhat dulled. However, these were very large bones and for the price they performed well. I would use again.
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not the sharpist tool in the shed
customer_reviews.text: These have a great spring but seem to dull fast. I bought them for quail but won't easily cut anymore and I have only used them maybe 20 to 25 times. They are heavy duty and look nice but not worth the purchase for butchering or cutting up meat and small bones.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha Green

customer_reviews.title: This product is made exceptionally well. The only challenge ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is made exceptionally well. The only challenge would be that this product is really made for medium to large hands. If you have small hands you will find these difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Pro cutter
customer_reviews.text: Just slightly heavy but amazing how they work. Very professional quality..
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife since she had talked about wanting one. She loves it and was very pleased at my choice and uses it whenever she can.
customer_reviews.author: Amar Rhom

customer_reviews.title: Not really necessary
customer_reviews.text: My mother used to use a pair of these and liked them so I thought my wife might enjoy a pair. She is unimpressed at best. I keep her knives razor sharp and she tells me these shears don’t do anything for her that her knives don’t.
customer_reviews.author: alfisch

customer_reviews.title: Large scissors as compared to my hold ones. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Large scissors as compared to my hold ones. I still find it difficult to cut through some plastic unless held firm. They are solid, nothing flimsy about them and should last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good tool for meat cutting, awkward in the hand so is hard to use for anything more than paper. Not worth it. The clasp at the back isn't functional...It cut my hand badly when it failed and the scissors sprung open. Not a safe product !
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Very well made Scissors
customer_reviews.text: Love these scissors. Very heavy duty. I use them for everything in the kitchen and have been very pleased with performance. I like the spring that spreads them apart. Very nice weight to them.
customer_reviews.author: Peak Adventure Rentals

customer_reviews.title: Scissors that would make Rambo Smile  ;-)
customer_reviews.text: Spring loaded, weighted, and very durable.... I would classify somewhere between scissors and hedge pruners... Quality product.... looks just lethal enough to make people back away when I'm grilling ... and that's a very wise decision ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty is Right!
customer_reviews.text: I smoke Chicken on a weekly basis in my Drum Smoker. The Kitchen Scissors are on of the best I have used. They do not give me hand fatigue and it makes Cutting the chicken in half a breeze! So far they have not rusted either.
customer_reviews.author: alfred torres

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Was contacted by customer service after thinking I was disappointed with the scissors, I am now satisfied with the scissors. They provided a video that was very informative and some tips. I was not using the scissors correctly. Thank you customer service for reaching out. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Summerfield

customer_reviews.title: This was a lot nicer than I thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot nicer than I thought it would be. The blades are thick and made for heavy duty shearing in the kitchen. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: tool man

customer_reviews.title: Screw holding these together was loose, but I couldn't tighten it, no matter how hard I tried.
customer_reviews.text: The scissors were not tight enough to cut anything, and the screw that holds them together was not able to be turned, no matter how hard I tried. I sent these back and got a different kind. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to using a lot!
customer_reviews.text: 2 day Prime shipping a big plus! Just now arrived. Look and feel like real quality product. Heavy duty meant to work. Very sharp. Looking forward to being one of my most used tools in the kitchen. Nice box shears are contained in. It will be great to store them in between use. Will comment again after using for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Debra and William

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp kitchen scissors. They are built for people with larger hands. We have found when using them with wet hands you need to be careful because your hands slip very easily. It would be nice to have some sort of anti slip grip on the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I realized that if you are going to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I realized that if you are going to cook chicken wings and many other dishes that need joints to be severed, these are the scissors you need!! \

customer_reviews.title: SWEET!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. Very well made and sharp too!!

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Utility, Very good all around kitchen scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, heavy. Spring makes any kitchen cutting job easy. Safety latch for storage. Boxed in pretty fabric lined box keeps scissors away from other utensils in the drawer. Very nice produce

customer_reviews.text: well make and great product, i use it for trimming the roses..

customer_reviews.text: I was needing some nice kitchen scissors and I am very happy with these! They are sharp and big enough to cut almost anything in my kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: They showed up very dull.

product_meta.title: Gelindo Kitchen Scissors - Heavy Duty Stainless Steel- Spring Loaded Shears - Sharp Blade- Safety Clip- Rust Free- Comfortable Handle- Great for Poultry, Fish, Chicken, Beef, BBQ, Herbs & Plastic
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL PACKAGE: This kitchen shear is wrapped with beautiful package which makes it a perfect Christmas or New Year gift for your family and friends.
NO BREAKING OR RUSTING: Our kitchen scissors heavy duty 4mm stainless steel construction spans from tip to end, and is triple riveted to guarantee unmatched durability.
EASY TO USE: Gelindo sports a spring loaded mechanism complemented by a sharp blade, making these stainless steel scissors strain-free.
CUTS THROUGH ANYTHING: With the functionality of an entire kitchen scissors set, you’ll effortlessly carve poultry, cut meat, scale fish, and slice through paper, plastic or metal sheeting.
LIFETIME WARRANTY: We’ve backed the best kitchen scissors with a 100% worry-free replacement guarantee, giving you absolutely nothing to lose. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars780 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
